title: The Calendar of State Papers, Colonial: North America and the West Indies
note:
Digitised with associated CO 1 manuscripts by ProQuest [http://id.lib.harvard.edu/alma/990127712780203941/catalog]

Modyford] answers to the inquiries of his Majesty's Commissioners, 21 Dec 1671, http://search.proquest.com.ezp-prod1.hul.harvard.edu/government-official-publications/governor-jamaicas-sir-thos-modyford-answers/docview/1845173538/se-2?accountid=11311]
